description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Topped With Blue Cheese & Mango Chutney recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free
name: Chicken Topped With Blue Cheese & Mango Chutney Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slices Gorgonzola cheese, each about 25 g

recipeInstructions.text: Put the chicken breasts between 2 sheets of clingfilm and beat them with a rolling pin until almost doubled in size and halved in thickness. Season with salt and pepper.
Brush the chicken breasts with oil and cook, turning once, in a preheated griddle pan for 78 minutes or until golden and cooked through.
Place on 4 warmed serving plates and top each with a slice of Gorgonzola and 1 tablespoon of mango chutney. Serve with a simple salad.
